hedline.hl2: Kathleen Rudkin and William McMullan Jr.

block.p: Kathleen Dougherty Rudkin, a daughter of Kathleen MacClarence Rudkin and Thomas Gilbert Rudkin of Fairfield, Conn., was married yesterday to William Holt McMullan Jr., the son of Carolyn Stevens McMullan and William Holt McMullan of Hattiesburg, Miss. The Rev. Nicholas T. Porter performed the ceremony at Trinity Episcopal Church in Southport, Conn.

Mrs. McMullan, 28, is a publicist at Random House in New York. She graduated from Cornell. Her father is a managing director of the Kafafian Group, an investment banking and financial services firm in Parsippany, N.J.
The couple were married on Saturday at Trinity Episcopal Church in Southport, Conn.

Kathleen Dougherty Rudkin, a daughter of Kathleen MacClarence Rudkin and Thomas Gilbert Rudkin of Fairfield, Conn., was married yesterday to William Holt McMullan Jr., the son of Carolyn Stevens McMullan and William Holt McMullan of Hattiesburg, Miss. The Rev. Nicholas T. Porter performed the ceremony at Trinity Episcopal Church in Southport, Conn.

Mrs. McMullan, 28, is a publicist at Random House in New York. She graduated from Cornell. Her father is a managing director of the Kafafian Group, an investment banking and financial services firm in Parsippany, N.J.
She is a great-granddaughter of Margaret Fogarty Rudkin, the founder of Pepperidge Farm Inc. and the author of ''The Margaret Rudkin Pepperidge Farm Cookbook.''

Mr. McMullan, also 28, will be a senior associate next month, in New York, in the United States buyout unit at the Carlyle Group, the Washington investment firm. He graduated from Duke and received an M.B.A. this month from Harvard.
His father is a regional president of Trustmark National Bank in Hattiesburg.
